<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/transactions/confirmed/{transactionId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the confirmation status of a transaction that was submitted to the Aleo blockchain.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={[{"name":"transactionId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
